channel.title: Readings on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Readings on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Readings
item.description: Course Textbook Brealey, Richard, Stewart Myers, and Franklin Allen. Principles of Corporate Finance. 9th ed. New York, NY: McGraw Hill, 2007. ISBN: 9780071266758. Additional Readings These readings are not required, but are of interest to those wishing to delve further into the subject of finance. Malkiel, Burton. A Random Walk Down Wall Street. New York, NY: W. W. Norton, 2007. ISBN: 9780393330335. This best-selling introduction to investing is now in its 9th edition and as popular as ever because of its entertaining style and sage advice.
